All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    Advance
    This class is the Advance order class.
    Airlift
    The Airlift class represents an order to move armies from one country to another in a game.
    App
    Initialize the Application
    ApplicationException
    The ApplicationException is a custom exception class that wraps all checked standard Java exceptions and can be used to handle risk-game-specific errors.
    Blockade
    The Blockade class represents a blockade order in a game, where a player blocks a country and triples its army count while removing it from their owned countries.
    Bomb
    The Bomb class represents a player's order to bomb a specific country, reducing its army count by half.
    CardType
    An enum for possible player cards.
    Command
    The Command enum represents the possible commands that can be issued by a user
    CommandInterpreter
    The CommandInterpreter class provides methods to extract the main command and argument list from a given command input.
    ConsoleLogger
    The ConsoleLogger class is an implementation of the Observer interface in Java that prints the given data when the update method is called.
    Constants
    The Constants class contains various constant values used throughout the code.
    Continent
    The Continent is a model class The Continent class represents a continent in a game, with properties such as continent ID, name, list of countries, list of neighboring countries, and bonus points.
    Country
    The `Country` class represents a country in the game, with properties such as country ID, name, continent ID, army count, owner, and neighboring countries.
    Deploy
    This class is the deploy order class.
    ExecuteOrderPhase
    The ExecuteOrderPhase class is a subclass of GamePlayPhase that represents the phase of the game where player orders are executed.
    FileLogger
    The FileLogger class is an implementation of the Observer interface that writes data to a file.
    GameEngine
    The GameEngine class is responsible for managing the game flow, handling user input, and executing commands in the Risk game.
    GameMap
    The GameMap class represents a game map that contains countries, continents, and players, and provides methods for accessing and manipulating these objects.
    GamePlayController
    The GamePlayController class is responsible for managing players, issuing orders, executing orders and their interactions in a game.
    GamePlayPhase
    The GamePlayPhase class is an abstract class that extends the Phase class and provides default implementations for gameplay-related methods.
    IssueOrderPhase
    The `IssueOrderPhase` class is a subclass of `GamePlayPhase` that represents the phase of the game where players issue orders.
    LogEntryBuffer
    The LogEntryBuffer class is a singleton implementation that acts as a buffer for log entries and notifies observers when new log entries are added.
    MapDisplay
    The MapDisplay class is responsible for displaying the game map, including continent and country information, and optionally showing the number of armies in each country.
    MapEditor
    This class operates on the current Game map.
    MapEditorController
    The MapEditorController class is responsible for managing the game map, players, issuing orders, executing orders and their interactions in a game.
    MapEditorPhase
    The MapEditorPhase class is an abstract class that extends the Phase class and provides default implementations for various methods related to map editing in a game.
    MapReader
    This class reads a map file and initialize into the Country and Continents.
    MapValidator
    The MapValidator class provides methods to validate a game map by checking for various conditions such as empty map, non-existent continents or neighbors, self-referencing neighbors, inaccessible countries, and disconnected continents.
    Negotiate
    This class is to negotiate with other players.
    Observable
    An interface for implementation of Observable with notifyObservers, attach and detach functions.
    Observer
    An interface is used to implement the Observer design pattern, which allows objects to be notified of changes in the state of another object (observable object).
    Order
    This class is an abstract class for order.
    Phase
    The `Phase` class is an abstract class that represents a phase in a Risk game and provides methods for various game commands.
    Player
    The Player class represents a player in this game, with properties such as name, countries owned, orders, and leftover armies, as well as methods to manipulate these properties.
    PlaySetupPhase
    The PlaySetupPhase class is a subclass of GamePlayPhase that handles the setup phase of the game, including creating and removing players, assigning countries, and transitioning to the main play phase.
    PostLoadPhase
    The PostLoadPhase class is a subclass of MapEditorPhase that represents the phase after loading a map in a game editor, allowing for editing and saving of the map.
    PreLoadPhase
    The PreLoadPhase class is a subclass of MapEditorPhase that handles the pre-loading phase of a game, allowing the user to load a map file and transition to the next phase.
    ReinforcementPhase
    The ReinforcementPhase class is a subclass of GamePlayPhase that handles the reinforcement phase of the game.
    Reinforcements
    This class is to reinforce armies for each player.
